msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Remove ADOBE SYSTEMS license, if present, and insert Apache license - modules.  Will need another pass to convert files not handled by the scripts.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Updating FXGUtils to CT Yuki Branch 887174.
This is the final drop of FXGUtils from CT and future changes will be made directly to this SVN repository by the Flex SDK.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Compiler optimized FXG 2.0 bug fixes and updating to latest FXGUtils.
Width and height attributes are now allowed on RichText.
The textRotation attribute is now supported.
Simple fix to recognize the paragraphEndIndent attribute.
Added support for resizeMode in BitmapGraphic.
From MXMLC: Simple fix to get <tab>'s working as they shouldn't have content assigned (although TLF seems to fail silently when you assign content to a tab).

Updating code generation for child "properties" that aren't part of the graphical DOM - we now generate code for linkHoverFormat, linkActiveFormat, linkNormalFormat, and format. However, the link doesn't actually behave with that formatting so I'll need TLF folks help for further investigation.

FXG compiled text should have regained sub formatting capabilities, including FXG 2.0, but there seems to be different clipping behavior of text content based on the container (runtime MXMLG example with Application as its parent seems to push text content beyond height="92" limit, where as compiled FXG example only has a SpriteVisualElement parent). SpriteVisualElement and RichText sizing interaction needs further investigation.
Is noteworthy for integration: No, not really, though downstream teams may be interested in several of these bug fixes.
SDK-22867 - <tab /> doesn't work for static FXG

SDK-22852 - You get a compile error when using paragraphEndIndent as an attribute of the

tag for static FXG.
SDK-22846 - [Gumbo_Priority] Compiled FXG text with subformatting loses some text, colors, etc.
SDK-22855 - <linkHoverFormat>, <linkActiveFormat> and <linkNormalFormat> tags don't work in static FXG content
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Remove ADOBE SYSTEMS license, if present, and insert Apache license - modules.  Will need another pass to convert files not handled by the scripts.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
